job description:
Requirements:
Arthur Lawrence is urgently looking for an Data Analyst / (AIMMS / GAMS) on W2 in Pearland, TX. Interested candidates can call me on 832-241-2463 or can send me their resumes at annie@arthurlawrence.net. Job description is mentioned below:

Must Have:
  • Experience with programming, Linux, Windows server, programming in GAMS/AIMMS or any other optimization package, optimization concepts, and data analysis.
  • In-depth knowledge of pipelines hydraulic and industrial gas sector.
  • Either B.S. with 8+ years of experience or M.S. with 4-5+ years of experience.
Nice to Have:
  • A PhD with 2+ years of experience in either one background Operations Research / Mechanical / Chemical engineering.
  • Excellent communication skills.
